div.h1: Essential Information for Elwood Schools During COVID-19 Closure Including Distance Learning

p.strong: Please be advised that as per Governor Cuomo, all schools in New York State are now officially closed through April 29, 2020.

h2.strong: Family Resources and Mental Health Support

div.p: Starting on May 4th, our "Grab & Go" lunch service is now available on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays between 10:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m. at Elwood Middle School. Families/Guardians will receive two bagged lunches/ breakfasts on Monday, two on Wednesdays and three on Fridays to provide 7-full days of lunch and breakfast s for each student.
